item.title: Man accused of staging wife's death to stand trial
item.description: <p>A man accused of staging his wife&#x27;s death as a tractor-drawn slasher accident will stand trial for murder despite his lawyer challenging experts about what caused her demise.</p>

item.title: Police scale back search for missing boy Gus, six days after his disappearance
item.description: <p>Police have scaled back their search for four-year-old August, or Gus, who went missing six days ago from his family&#x27;s remote homestead in South Australia. </p>
